Text.Language: Pi,~lom n~te pensousou: t~a~par,/ m~pencw]: p~tajro m~pentoubo: pe Maria ]paryenoc.
The crown of our pride, the head of our salvation, the confirmation of our purity, is the Virgin Mary.
إكليل ?خرنا ورأس خلاصنا وثبات طهرنا هى مريم العذراء.
Y/e~tacmici nan: m~V] pilogoc: v/e~tafswpi n~rwmi: eybe penoujai.
Who for us gave birth, to God the Word, who became man, for our salvation.
التى ولدت لنا الله الكلمة الذى صار انساناً لاجل خلاصنا.
Menenca y~referrwmi: n~yof on pe V]: eybe vai acmacf: ecoi m~paryenoc.
And after He became man, He remained God, wherefore she gave birth to Him, while a virgin.
وبعد أن صار انساناً هو الإله أيضاً ?لهذا ولدته وهي عذراء.
C[oci n~je ]s~v/ri: n~te pecjinerboki: pecjinmici on: ouatcaji m~mof pe.
Exalted is the wonder, of her pregnancy, and her delivery, is unutterable.
عالية هى الاعجوبة التى لحبلها وولادتها أيضاً لاينطق به.
Je n~yof qen pefouws: nem p~]ma] n~Pefiwt: nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: afi~ afcw] m~mon.
For of His own will, and the pleasure of His Father, and the Holy Spirit, He came and saved us.
لأنه بإرادته ومسرة أبيه والروح القدس أتى وخلصنا.
Ounis] pe p~w~ou: n~te teparyenia~: Maria ]paryenoc: y/etj/k e~bol.
Great is the glory, of your virginity, O Virgin Mary, the perfect one.
عظيم هو مجد بتوليتك يامريم العذراء الكاملة.
Arejem h~mot: Po#c# sop neme: n~yo te ]mouki: y/e~ta Iakwb nau e~roc.
You have found grace, and the Lord is with you, you are the ladder, which Jacob saw.
وجدت? نعمة الرب معك أنت? هي السلم التي رآها يعقوب.
Ectajr/out hijen pikahi: ec[oci sa e~h~r/i e~t~ve: e~re niaggeloc: n/ou e~pec/t hiwtc.
Set firmly on the earth, reaching to heaven, where the angels, come down upon it.
ثابتة على الأرض ومرت?عة إلى السماء والملائكة نازلون عليها.
Nyo pe pis~s/n: e~tafnau e~rof n~je Mwuc/c: efmoh qen pi,~rwm: ouoh nafrwkh an.
You are the bush, which Moses has seen, flaming with fire, and was not consumed.
أنت? هي الشجرة التي رآها موسى م?تقدة بالنار ولم تحترق.
Ete vai pe p~s/ri m~Vnou]: e~tafswpi qen teneji: m~pe pi,~rwm n~te tefmeynou]: rwkh m~pecwma.
This is the Son of God, who dwelt in your womb, the fire of His divinity, did not consume your body.
اى ابن الله الذي أتى وحل ?ي بطنك ونار لاهوته لم تحرق جسدك.
Nyo te ]koi: m~pou] j~roj e~roc: a~retaouo~ e~bol: n~oukarpoc n~wnq.
You are the field, that was not planted, but you did give, the Fruit of Life.
أنت هي الحقل الذى لم ي?زرع واخرجت ثمرة حياة.
Nyo pe pia~ho: e~tafsopf n~je Iwc/f: afjem pimargarit/c: efh/p qen tefm/].
You are the treasure, that Joseph bought, and he found the pearl, hidden in its midst.
انت هي الكنز الذى اشتراه يوس? ?وجد الجوهر مخ?ى ?ى وسطه.
Afjem Pencwt/r: I/#c# qen teneji: a~rej~vof e~pikocmoc: san~tefcw] m~mon.
Our Savior Jesus, was found in your womb, you gave birth to Him for the world, so He might save us.
وجد مخلصنا يسوع ?ى بطنك وولدتيه إلى العالم حتى خلصنا.
Je n~yof qen pefouws: nem p~]ma] n~Pefiwt: nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: afi~ afcw] m~mon.
For of His own will, and the pleasure of His Father, and the Holy Spirit, He came and saved us.
لأنه بإرادته ومسرة أبيه والروح القدس أتى وخلصنا.
<ere ]macnou]: p~yel/l n~niaggeloc: ,ere ]cemne: p~hiwis n~te niprov/t/c.
Hail to the Mother of God, the rejoicing of angels, hail to the chaste one, the preaching of the prophets.
السلام لوالدة الإله تهليل الملائكة السلام للع?ي?ة كرازة الانبياء.
<ere y/e~tacjem h~mot: Po#c# sop neme: ,ere y/e~tac[i n~ten piaggeloc: m~v~rasi m~pikocmoc.
Hail to you who has found grace, the Lord is with you, hail to you who accepted, the joy of the world.
السلام للتى وجدت نعمة الرب معك? السلام للتى قبلت من الملاك ?رح العالم.
<ere y/e~tacmici: m~v~refyamio~ m~pip~t/rf: ,ere y/e~tacm~p~sa m~mou] e~roc: je y~mau m~P,#c#.
Hail to her who gave birth, to the Creator of all, hail to her who is worthy, to be called the Mother of Christ.
السلام للتى وَلَدت خالق الكل السلام للتى استحقت أن ت?دعى أم المسيح.
<ere y/e~tac]: m~p~cw] n~Adam nem Eua: ,ere y/e~tac][i: m~v~refsans n~ouon niben.
Hail to you who brought, salvation to Adam and Eve, hail to her who nursed, the Provider of everyone.
السلام للتى أعطت الخلاص لآدم وحواء السلام للتى ارضعت عائل كل احد.
<ere y/e#y#u#: y~mau n~n/etonq t/rou: nyo pe e~tentwbh m~mo: a~rip~recbeuin e~jwn.
Hail to the Saint, the mother of all the living, you are the one we entreat to, intercede for us.
السلام للقديسة أم جميع الاحياء نطلب اليك أن تش?عي ?ينا.
Je n~yof qen pefouws: nem p~]ma] n~Pefiwt: nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: afi~ afcw] m~mon.
For of His own will, and the pleasure of His Father, and the Holy Spirit, He came and saved us.
لأنه بإرادته ومسرة أبيه والروح القدس أتى وخلصنا.
Are san ouai: ]niatf m~mo: w~ ]paryenoc e#y#u#: ouoh m~macnou].
If someone contemplates, about you, O holy Virgin, and Mother of God.
إذا تأملك احد أيتها العذراء القديسة والدة الإله.
Nem pimuct/rion: etoi n~s~v/ri: e~tafswpi n~q/]: eybe penoujai.
And about the mystery, full of wonder, which dwelt in you, for our salvation.
والسر العجيب الذي صار ?يك لأجل خلاصنا.
Fna,arwf men: eybe ]metatcaji m~mof: f~natounocten e~p~swi: e~oujinerhumnoc.
He would keep silent, for he cannot utter, he would make us, rise up for praise.
?انه يصمت من أجل ما لا ينطق به ويقيمنا إلى التسبيح.
Eybe ]metnis]: n~te v/etoi n~s~v/ri: n~referpeynanef: etoi n~ouyo n~r/].
Because of the greatness, of the wonderful, Maker of, all good things.
من أجل عظمة العجيب صانع الخيرات المتنوعة.
Pilogoc gar etonq: n~te V] Viwt: e~tafi~ e~pec/t e~]nomoc: hijen p~twou n~Cina.
For the living Word, of God the Father, came down to give the Law, on Mount Sinai.
لأن كلمة الله ألحى الذي للآب نزل ليعطى الناموس على جبل سيناء.
Afhwbc n~t~ave: m~pitwou qen ou,~remtc: nem ou,aki nem oug~novoc: nem oucaray/ou.
He covered the peak, of the mountain, with smoke darkness and mist, and with storms.
وعلى رأس الجبل بالدخان والظلام والضباب والعاص?.
Ebolhiten ]c~m/: n~te hancalpiggoc: naf]c~bw qen ouho]: n~n/eto~hi e~ratou.
Through the sound, of the trumpets, He was teaching, the people standing with fear.
ومن جهة صوت الأبواق كان يعلم الواق?ين بمخا?ة.
Nyof on afi~ e~pec/t e~jw: qa pitwou n~logikon: qen oumetremraus: nem oumetmairwmi.
He also descended on you, O speaking mountain, that spoke with humility, and love of mankind.
هو أيضا نزل عليك أيتها الجبل الناطق بوداعة ومحبه بشرية.
Ouoh on m~pair/]: af[icarx n~q/]: qen oumetatsib]: n~oucarx n~logik/.
And likewise, He took flesh from you, without alteration, a speaking body.
وهكذا أيضا تجسد منك بغير تغيير بجسد ناطق.
No~mooucioc neman: ecj/k e~bol: e~ouon n~tac m~mau: n~ou'u,/ n~no/~ra.
Coessential with us, and perfect, and also has, a rational soul.
مساو لنا كامل وله ن?س عاقلة.
Afo~hi efoi n~nou]: qen v/enafoi m~mof: ouoh afswpi n~rwmi: n~telioc.
He remained God, as He is, and became, a perfect man.
بقى إلها على حاله وصار إنسانا كاملا.
Hina n~tefbwl e~bol: m~parap~twma n~Adam: ouoh n~tefcw]: m~v/etaftako.
So as to abolish, the iniquity of Adam, and that He may save, those who perished.
لكي يحل زلة آدم ويخلص من هلك.
Ntefaif m~polit/c: n~h~r/i qen niv/oui: n~teftacyof e~tefar,/: kata peknis] n~nai.
And to make him a citizen, of heaven, and restore his authority, according to His great mercy.
ويصيره مدنيا ?ي السماوات ويرده إلى رئاسته كعظيم رحمته.
Je n~yof qen pefouws: nem p~]ma] n~Pefiwt: nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: afi~ afcw] m~mon.
For of His own will, and the pleasure of His Father, and the Holy Spirit, He came and saved us.
لأنه بإرادته ومسرة أبيه والروح القدس أتى وخلصنا.
Ptaio~ n~]paryenoc: ouatcaji m~mof pe: je aV] ouasc: afi~ afswpi n~q/tc.
The honor of the Virgin, is unutterable, for God desired her, and came and dwelt in her.
كرامة العذراء لا ينطق بها لأن الله أرادها وجاء وسكن ?يها.
V/etsop qen piouwini: n~ats~qwnt e~rof: afswpi qen tecneji: m~'~it n~a~bot.
He who abides in light, that is unapproachable, dwelt in her womb, for nine months.
الساكن ?ى النور غير المقترب اليه حل ?ى بطنها تسعة شهور.
Piaynau e~rof: piat]yws e~rof: a~Maria macf: ecoi m~paryenoc.
Mary gave birth to, the Invisible, and Infinite One, and remained a virgin.
غير المنظور غير المحدود ولدته مريم وهى عذراء.
Vai gar pe piw~ni: v/e~ta Dani/l: nau e~rof e~ausatf: e~bolhi outwou.
For this is the stone, which Daniel saw, which was cut, from a mountain.
لأن هذا هو الحجر الذى رآه دانيال قد ق?طع من جبل?.
Ete m~pejij n~rwmi: [oh e~rof e~p~t/rf: e~te vai pe pilogoc: pie~bol qen Viwt.
The hands of men, never touched Him, for He is the Word, of the Father.
ولم تلمسه يد انسان البتة هو الكلمة الذى من الآب.
Afi~ af[icarx: e~bol qen ]paryenoc: a[ne c~perma n~rwmi: san~tefcw] m~mon.
He came and took flesh, from the Virgin, without the seed of man, in order to save us.
أتى وتجسد من العذراء بغير زرع بشر حتى خلصنا.
Je n~yof qen pefouws: nem p~]ma] n~Pefiwt: nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: afi~ afcw] m~mon.
For of His own will, and the pleasure of His Father, and the Holy Spirit, He came and saved us.
لأنه بإرادته ومسرة أبيه والروح القدس أتى وخلصنا.
Areswpi n~ouk~ladoc: n~te pitoubo: ouoh n~kumillon: n~te pinah].
You became a branch, of purity, and a vessel, of the faith.
صرت غصنا للطهارة واناء للايمان.
Noryodoxoc: n~te nenio] e#y#u#: w~ ]cemne m~macnou]: ettai/out m~paryenoc.
Of the Orthodox, our holy fathers, O chaste Mother of God, the honored Virgin.
الأرثوذكسى الذى لآبائنا القديسين أيتها الع?ي?ة والدة الاله المكرمة العذراء.
Je a~remici nan: m~V] pilogoc: Pencwt/r I/#c#: afi~ afcw] m~mon.
For us you gave birth to, God the Word, our Savior Jesus, He came and saved us.
لأنك ولدت لنا الله الكلمة مخلصنا يسوع أتى وخلصنا.
Je n~yof qen pefouws: nem p~]ma] n~Pefiwt: nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: afi~ afcw] m~mon.
For of His own will, and the pleasure of His Father, and the Holy Spirit, He came and saved us.
لأنه بإرادته ومسرة أبيه والروح القدس أتى وخلصنا.
Nyo y~mau m~piouwini: ettai/out m~macnou]: a~refai qa pilogoc: pia,writoc.
You are the Mother of Light, the honored Mother of God, you have carried, the Uncircumscript Logos.
أنت ياأم النور المكرمة والدة الاله حملت الكلمة غير المحوى.
Menenca y~remacf: a~reo~hi ereoi m~paryenoc: qen hanhwc nem hanc~mou: ten[ici mm~o.
After you gave birth to Him, you remained a virgin, with praises and blessings, we magnify you.
وبعد ما ولدته بقيت عذراء بتسابيح وبركات نعظمك.
Je n~yof qen pefouws: nem p~]ma] n~Pefiwt: nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: afi~ afcw] m~mon.
For of His own will, and the pleasure of His Father, and the Holy Spirit, He came and saved us.
لأنه بإرادته ومسرة أبيه والروح القدس أتى وخلصنا.
Ere as n~lac n~carx: nas~erpinoin m~mo: w~ ]paryenoc eyouab: ouoh m~macnou].
What bodily tongue, can describe you, O holy Virgin, and Mother of God.
أى لسان جسدى يستطيع أن يتأملك أيتها العذراء القديسة والدة الاله.
Je a~reswpi n~ouy~ronoc: m~bacilikon: m~v/e~toufai m~mof: hijen ni,eroubim.
For you became, a royal throne for the One, who is carried, by the cherubim.
لأنك صرت عرشا ملوكيا للمحمول على الشاروبيم.
Ennas~ermakarizin: m~mo n~as n~r/]: je a~re[ici e~nivucic: n~no/~ron etcap~swi.
By what means can we bless you, for you were exalted, above all the highest, and rational natures.
بأى نوع نقدر أن نطوبك لأنك ارت?عت عن الطبائع العلوية العقلية.
Ceerv~meui m~peran: qen genea~ niben: w~ ][rompi eynecwc: ouoh y~mau m~P,#c#.
Your name is remembered, throughout all ages, O beautiful dove, the Mother of Christ.
ي?ذكر اسمك ?ى كل الاجيال أيتها الحمامة الحسناء وأم المسيح.
Ounof m~mo Maria: ]bwki ouoh ]mau: je v/et qen pea~m/r: niaggeloc cehwc e~rof.
Rejoice O Mary, the handmaiden and mother, for He who is on your lap, the angels praise.
ا?رحي يامريم العبدة والام لان الذى ?ى حجرك تسبحه الملائكة.
Ouoh ni,eroubim: ceouwst m~mof a~xiwc: nem niceravim: qen oumetatmounk.
And the cherubim, worship Him befittingly, and the seraphim, without ceasing.
والشاروبيم تسجد له باستحقاق والسارو?يم بغير ?تور.
Euerripizin qen noutenh: je vai pe p~ouro n~te p~w~ou: v/etw~li m~v~nobi m~pikocmoc: kata pefnis] n~nai.
They flap their wings, saying “This is the King of glory, who carries the sins of the world, according to His great mercy.?
ي?ر?ر?ون باجنحتهم قائلين هذا هو ملك المجد را?ع خطية العالم كعظيم رحمته.
Anon hwn tentwbh: eyrensasni eunai: hiten nep~recbia: n~totf m~pimairwmi.
And we also pray, that we may win mercy, through your intercessions, with the Lover of Mankind.
ونحن أيضاً نطلب أن ن?وز برحمة بش?اعاتك عند محب البشر.
